last_episode_to_air.name: The Divorce Party
last_episode_to_air.overview: When Chris and Sheila think about having another baby together, Nick and Emily plan a divorce party to remind Chris about his past with Sheila; Marny's younger sister is hired as Gary's assistant.

name: Guys with Kids
overview: Three 30-something dads try to hold on to their youth as they face the responsibilities of having kids. Thankfully, Gary, Chris and Nick have each other to help navigate the highs and lows of fatherhood - while still trying desperately to remain dudes.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: When Chris is asked out to a Knicks game, he must find a babysitter without his ex-wife Shelia finding out. Elsewhere, Gary and Marny find an unusual spot for some alone time. Meanwhile, Nick is in the dog house when he forgets about an important event with his wife, Emily.

episodes.name: Chris' New Girlfriend
episodes.overview: Nick confesses to having a shared past with Chris' new girlfriend; Gary steels himself for the consequences of forgetting his anniversary.

episodes.name: Marny Wants a Girl
episodes.overview: When Marny makes moves to have another child, Gary looks to the guys for some help with population control.

episodes.name: The Standoff
episodes.overview: Gary experiments with unconventional disciplinary tactics; Marny insists on helping Chris; a school project leads Nick to feel overly competitive.

episodes.name: Gary's Day Off
episodes.overview: Marny agrees to take care of the kids so Gary can have a break; the guys help Sheila move in hope of getting back Chris' Giants tickets.

episodes.name: Apartment Halloween
episodes.overview: Nick goes to war with the new co-op board president, Lydia (Marissa Jaret Winokur), when she forbids his annual Halloween decorations.

episodes.name: The Bathroom Incident
episodes.overview: Gary gets Emily's help organizing his apartment; Freddie and Ernie lock themselves in the bathroom; the guys talk to Nick about his lack of preparation.

episodes.name: First Birthday
episodes.overview: Chris plans a nontraditional celebration for Ernie's first birthday; Manny and Gary try a kale-only diet; Sheila tries to deal with her breakup.

episodes.name: Thanksgiving
episodes.overview: Sheila tries to win the gang over with a traditional Thanksgiving dinner; Gary decides to spend the holiday waiting in line for a TV that's on sale.

episodes.name: Christmas
episodes.overview: Emily and Nick think Manny and Gary's marriage is in a rut; Sheila and Chris must decide who keeps the engagement ring after their divorce.

episodes.name: First Word
episodes.overview: Nick and Chris argue about who brought Sheila into their life; Gary talks about the origin of his chipped tooth; Sheila and Chris wait for Ernie's first word.

episodes.name: Marny's Dad
episodes.overview: Gary is willing to do anything to earn his father-in-law's respect; Chris goes on a date with Shelia.

episodes.name: Me Time
episodes.overview: Overwhelmed by pressure at work and at home, Marny lies to Gary in hope of securing some time alone; when Chris signs the group up for trivia night, Nick and Sheila's competitive nature causes problems.

episodes.name: The Will
episodes.overview: A near-death experience leaves Marny and Gary worried about their children's future; Chris is jealous of Ernie's new male nanny (Mark Consuelos).

episodes.name: Gary's Idea
episodes.overview: Marny is dismayed when Gary comes up with a business idea; Chris decides to reinvent himself and starts a new hobby.

episodes.name: A Rare Breed
episodes.overview: Gary struggles to keep up with his successful new career and his responsibilities as a dad; a missing toy makes a sound that keeps Emily and Nick up at night; Ernie is held back at his play group.

episodes.name: The Divorce Party
episodes.overview: When Chris and Sheila think about having another baby together, Nick and Emily plan a divorce party to remind Chris about his past with Sheila; Marny's younger sister is hired as Gary's assistant.
